gt_metadata.revision_notes: v3.0: Tier changes: GT-05: T2 -> T3. Previous: 2.3_corrected_2026-01-14_v3_LOCKED

key_elements: Neither party liable for consequential damages
No carve-outs for willful misconduct, gross negligence
ground_truth.contract_text: NEITHER PARTY SHALL BE LIABLE FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIS AGREEMENT.

ground_truth.issue: Liability Cap SOW-Based - Creates Variable Exposure Per Engagement
key_elements: Cap is per-SOW, not aggregate across relationship
Structural issue: liability exposure varies by engagement size
Small SOW with major deliverable creates disproportionate risk
No carve-outs for IP infringement or confidentiality breach
Should use aggregate fees or minimum floor (e.g., $500K)
Should add carve-outs for critical categories
ground_truth.contract_text: AGENCY'S TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY CLIENT UNDER THE APPLICABLE STATEMENT OF WORK GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIM.

key_elements: License to Agency IP is non-exclusive, perpetual, royalty-free
BUT 'solely as part of the Deliverables'
Cannot modify, sublicense, or use independently
If Agency IP is core component, Client is locked in
Should add sublicense rights to affiliates
ground_truth.contract_text: To the extent Agency IP is incorporated into any Deliverables, Agency hereby grants Client a non-exclusive, perpetual, royalty-free license to use such Agency IP solely as part of the Deliverables.

key_elements: If Client fails to respond in 15 days, deemed REJECTED
Creates perpetual revision loop if Client is slow
Or add deemed acceptance after cure period
ground_truth.contract_text: Client shall review each Deliverable and provide written acceptance or detailed written rejection specifying deficiencies within fifteen (15) business days of delivery. If Client fails to provide written notice within such period, the Deliverable shall be deemed rejected and Agency shall have an opportunity to cure.

key_elements: No cure period before interest accrues
Should reduce to 1% or prime + margin
ground_truth.contract_text: Late payments shall bear interest at one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month.

key_elements: Client delays extend timelines AND 'additional fees may apply'
No advance notice of fee amount
ground_truth.contract_text: If Client delays in providing materials, approvals, or feedback, project timelines shall be extended accordingly, and additional fees may apply.

key_elements: Should include work product used in final
ground_truth.contract_text: Upon full payment of all fees due, Client shall own all right, title, and interest in the final approved Deliverables created specifically for Client under this Agreement.

key_elements: All concepts, sketches, drafts remain Agency property
Even if Client paid for development
Agency could reuse or sell to competitors
Should limit Agency's use of preliminary work
Or transfer to Client with final
ground_truth.contract_text: All concepts, sketches, drafts, and preliminary work product that are not incorporated into final approved Deliverables shall remain Agency's property.

key_elements: Client may need to use urgently
Waives right to reject known defects
Should allow use without waiving defect claims
ground_truth.contract_text: Client's use of any Deliverable in commerce or public distribution shall constitute final acceptance of such Deliverable.

ground_truth.issue: Warranties - No Duration or Specific Remedy
key_elements: Agency warrants professional manner and conformance
ground_truth.contract_text: Agency represents and warrants that: (a) it has the right to enter into this Agreement; (b) the Services will be performed in a professional manner; (c) the Deliverables will conform to the specifications in the applicable SOW; and (d) the Deliverables will not infringe third-party intellectual property rights.
EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH HEREIN, AGENCY MAKES NO WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

key_elements: Creative work may have longer commercial value
Should extend to 5 years or indefinite for trade secrets
ground_truth.contract_text: This obligation shall survive termination for three (3) years.

key_elements: Only addresses delivery of completed work Client paid for
No provision for return of Client Materials
ground_truth.contract_text: Upon termination: (a) Client shall pay for all Services performed and expenses incurred through termination; (b) Agency shall deliver all completed work product for which Client has paid.

key_elements: May be inconvenient for non-NY clients
ground_truth.contract_text: Disputes shall be resolved by arbitration in New York, New York.

key_elements: Agency may receive/process Client personal data
No data protection or privacy obligations stated
ground_truth.contract_text: N/A - No data protection provision exists in contract

key_elements: No E&O, CGL, or Cyber liability requirements
ground_truth.contract_text: N/A - No insurance requirements provision exists in contract

key_elements: Agency can display Deliverables in portfolio
Consider explicit opt-out right for sensitive work
ground_truth.contract_text: Agency shall have the right to display Deliverables in Agency's portfolio, website, and marketing materials, subject to any confidentiality restrictions.

key_elements: Should clarify what becomes Agency IP vs Client IP
ground_truth.contract_text: "Agency IP" means all intellectual property owned by or licensed to Agency prior to the Effective Date, including methodologies, frameworks, templates, software tools, and pre-existing creative works.

key_elements: No deadline for Agency to respond to request
No dispute process if parties disagree on scope
ground_truth.contract_text: Any changes to the scope, timeline, or fees must be documented in a written change order signed by both Parties.
Client shall reimburse Agency for pre-approved out-of-pocket expenses... Expenses exceeding $500 require Client's prior written approval.

key_elements: When deposit is required not specified
ground_truth.contract_text: For project work, Agency may require a deposit of up to fifty percent (50%) prior to commencing work.

key_elements: Could be one minor change or complete redo
ground_truth.contract_text: Agency shall provide up to two (2) rounds of revisions to each Deliverable at no additional charge. Additional revisions shall be billed at Agency's then-current hourly rates.

key_elements: May be unfamiliar to non-NY clients
ground_truth.contract_text: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York.

key_elements: Could be liable for delay due to pandemic, disaster
ground_truth.contract_text: N/A - No force majeure provision exists in contract

key_elements: Should add SLA for retainer work
ground_truth.contract_text: N/A - No service level commitments exist in contract

key_elements: Neither party can assign without consent
No M&A or affiliate exception for either party
Should add standard exceptions for both parties
ground_truth.contract_text: Neither Party may assign without prior written consent.

issues: GT-01 (10.1 - Exclusion of Damages - No Carv)
GT-08 (5.3 - Preliminary Work Retained by A)
GT-09 (6.3 - Use in Commerce = Final Accept)
GT-10 (8.1 - Warranties - No Duration or Sp)
GT-19 (2.2 - Change Orders - No Response Ti)

tier_adjustments: GT-17 (5.4 Portfolio Rights) demoted from T2 to T3 - has 'subject to confidentiality restrictions' carve-out
GT-26 (13.3 Assignment) demoted from T2 to T3 - mutual restriction, not asymmetric
contract_verification: 6.1 silence=rejection confirmed - UNUSUAL provision, kept at T1
5.4 portfolio rights has confidentiality carve-out - demoted
13.3 assignment is mutual 'Neither Party' - corrected description
validation_notes.renumbered: All GT IDs renumbered sequentially GT-01 to GT-26
